text: Nearly 18 years after their first wedding, Brad Pitt and Jennifer Aniston reportedly are planning their second wedding to each other. This time around it is set to take place in Mexico reports Woman's Day, just days after Jennifer confirmed her split with Justin Theroux. ` ` Jen's in her element organising it all,'' a source told the magazine.
